message.content:
{
  "weekly_summary": "Risk-on week with improving breadth in mid/small caps. Clean continuation in GMRAIRPORT and LTF, ABCAPITAL near highs, RVNL coiled just under breakout, NBCC retested prior breakout, and LAURUSLABS broke above the 1,005/1,025 supply. Capital goods steady (BHEL holding above 287–292 band). Exchanges/depositories stable (BSE >2860, CDSL >1600). Plan: add small on strength, keep tight stops.",
  "trades": [
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "GMRAIRPORT",
      "shares": 10,
      "amount": 1084.00,
      "reason": "Add on breakout continuation only above ₹109.2 with volume; protective SL ₹103.8. Trend held above 105.5 and closed firm."
    },
    {
      "action": "buy",
      "symbol": "LAURUSLABS",
      "shares": 1,
      "amount": 1031.35,
      "reason": "Fresh breakout >₹1005/1025; buy on strength above ₹1033 with SL ₹1004 to diversify into pharma momentum."
    }
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 868.95,
    "total_value": 27184.30,
    "holdings_count": 6,
    "holdings": [
      "GMRAIRPORT: 40 units",
      "LTF: 20 units",
      "RVNL: 20 units",
      "ABCAPITAL: 10 units",
      "NBCC: 40 units",
      "LAURUSLABS: 1 unit"
    ],
    "weekly_pnl": "+0.0%"
  },
  "screening_changes": [
    "Remove MCX: capital-inefficient (₹10k/share) and elevated gap risk for a ₹25k portfolio; prefer BSE/CDSL in the exchanges theme.",
    "Remove AMBER: high ticket size (₹7k/share) and lower liquidity vs alternatives; capital-inefficient for this portfolio."
  ]
}
